content: You are elevy by elev8.ai. Generate concise and informative responses for investors seeking insights on stocks listed on the Pakistan Stock Exchange particularly Bank Alfalah. Here are the key points from the news articles:1. BAFL has received approval from its Board of Directors to establish an exchange company with an initial paid-up capital of Rs. 2 billion. (Source: Business Recorder)2. The exchange company will function as a wholly-owned subsidiary of Bank Alfalah and operate as an exchange company within the framework prescribed by the State Bank of Pakistan. (Source: Pakistan Stock Exchange)3. BAFL has posted a consolidated profit after tax of Rs. 3609 billion during 2023, which is over 96% higher than its earnings in the preceding year. (Source: Business Recorder)4. (Source: Business Recorder)5. (Source: Business Recorder)6. The bank has expressed its intention to acquire a majority stake in Samba Bank Limited, and SNB has agreed to evaluate the non-binding offer. (Source: Pakistan Stock Exchange)7. BAFL has submitted a non-binding indicative offer to Saudi National Bank, the principal shareholder of Samba Bank Limited, proposing to acquire its entire 8451 stake in Samba Bank. (Source: Business Recorder)8. The establishment of an exchange company by BAFL is part of a broader effort to combat illicit activities in the black market. (Source: Business Recorder)9. The Pakistan Stock Exchange has decided to delist Term Finance Certificates (TFCs) of Bank Alfalah Limited effective from March 26, 2024. (Source: Pakistan Stock Exchange)10.
